reviewText: This DVD is awesome. I learnt so much with this abour billow. And it is a great adding in your dance ministry

This Fantastic video of Billow Cloth Beauty will help you to add majesty and beauty to your choreographies. If you want to learn some fun creative ways to use billow cloth I absolutely recommend you to obtain this amazing DVD. This video is full of fun creatives ideas in how to use billow cloths in your choreographies with dance.

The Billow Cloth Beauty DVD by Pastor Lynn Hayden is delivered beautifully in such an artistic way applying different ways to incorporate the use of billows in praise, worship, and presentation in addition to entering and exiting tips.  This is such a great DVD to have.

Pastor Lynn Hayden gives very easy to follow guidance and demonstrations for adding  billow cloths to dance worship. She speaks about the scriptural significance and shows how to add flags and dancers.  You will end up in worship while you watch the worship demonstration at the end. You need this video to take your dance worship to the next level!!

The Billow Cloth Beauty DVD demonstrates true to the title. Experience the beauty and fun wrapped up in one video!  Theres various and creative ways one or several billow cloths will enhance your dance with bright colors to choose from.  You will love this gem of a DVD!
If you are looking for learn how use billow cloths, this DVD is for you. Excellent ideas!
Ever wonder what you can do with Billows!  This DVD is the answer!!  So many unique ideas!!!  One of a kind!!

Billow Cloth Beauty is a fantastic tool for learning all about billow cloths. Pastor Lynn gives very clear instructions that start with basic tips such as what the best material for a billow cloth is and how to hold it, and then moves onto the basic moves and shapes followed by more complex ones. After watching Billow Cloth Beauty, you will feel excited and ready to incorporate them into your dances for the Lord.
